member.name: T:Epicor.Mfg.IF.IBomSearch
member.summary: bo/BomSearch/BomSearch.p To return records from the bom option for drag/drop inside Job Entry, QuoteAsm Entry, and Engineering Work Bench and any other places that may need to search this data.

member.name: M:Epicor.Mfg.IF.IBomSearch.createPartMtlRefDes
member.remarks: &QTableName - MANDATORY - Name of table to find &QLock - type of lock to put on record NO-LOCK (default) or EXCLUSIVE-LOCK &QWhere - MANDATORY - criteria to find record &QFind - type of find to perform, unique, first, next or last &Columns - List of columns

member.name: M:Epicor.Mfg.IF.IBomSearch.GetAllAlternateTrees(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.Boolean)
member.summary: This methods will return a dataset that will include PartRev, PartOpr, PartOpDtl, PartMtl, PartMtlRestriction, PartMtlRestrictSubst, PartMtlRefDes, PartOprRestriction and PartOprRestrictSubst if those records exist for the appropriate input parameters. ALL ALTERNATES OF THE PARTREVISION WILL BE RETURNED if ipcomplete is true This method will also allow you to return the whole dataset or allow the user to specify how far down the tree they would like to return possible "part" records for.
member.param: The Part Number to return data for.
The Revision Number to return data for.
For partrev records other than the first one, would you like to use the default alternate method or the inputted one?
The as of date for the revisions, what would this look as of this date
Would you like to retun a complete dataset for this group?
member.returns: Dataset to search for Bom records.

member.name: M:Epicor.Mfg.IF.IBomSearch.GetDatasetForTree(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.Boolean)
member.summary: This methods will return a dataset that will include PartRev, PartOpr, PartOpDtl, PartMtl, PartMtlRestriction, PartMtlRestrictSubst, PartOprRestriction and PartOprRestrictSubst if those records exist for the appropriate input parameters. This method will also allow you to return the whole dataset or allow the user to specify how the revision to return possible "part" records for.
member.param: The Part Number to return data for.
The Revision Number to return data for.
The Alternate Method to return data for.
For partrev records other than the first one, would you like to use the default alternate method or the inputted one?
The as of date for the revisions, what would this look as of this date
Would you like to retun a complete dataset for this group?
member.returns: Dataset to search for Bom records.
